animeDescription: Each episode of this series tells the story of a famous fairy tale from all around the world. Some of them are adapted from famous books such as "The Iliad".  (Source: ANN)
animeStaff: [['Dezaki Osamu', ['Director', 'Episode Director', 'Character Design']], ['Kawajiri Yoshiaki', ['Episode Director', 'Principle Drawing', 'Character Design', 'Background Art', 'Key Animation']], ['Ishiguro Noboru', ['Episode Director']], ['Takahashi Ryousuke', ['Episode Director']]]
